CEffectData/GetAngles.description: Returns the angles of the effect.

CEffectData/GetAttachment.description: Returns the attachment ID for the effect.

CEffectData/GetColor.description: Returns byte which represents the color of the effect.

CEffectData/GetDamageType.description: Returns the damage type of the effect

CEffectData/GetEntIndex.description: Returns the entity index of the entity set for the effect.

CEffectData/GetEntity.description: Returns the entity assigned to the effect.

CEffectData/GetFlags.description: Returns the flags of the effect.

CEffectData/GetHitBox.description: Returns the hit box ID of the effect.

CEffectData/GetMagnitude.description: Returns the magnitude of the effect.

CEffectData/GetMaterialIndex.description: Returns the material ID of the effect.

CEffectData/GetNormal.description: Returns the normalized direction vector of the effect.

CEffectData/GetOrigin.description: Returns the origin position of the effect.

CEffectData/GetRadius.description: Returns the radius of the effect.

CEffectData/GetScale.description: Returns the scale of the effect.

CEffectData/GetStart.description: Returns the start position of the effect.

CEffectData/GetSurfaceProp.description: Returns the surface property index of the effect.

CEffectData/SetAngles.description: Sets the angles of the effect.

CEffectData/SetAttachment.description: Sets the attachment id of the effect to be created with this effect data.

CEffectData/SetColor.description: Sets the color of the effect.

CEffectData/SetDamageType.description: Sets the damage type of the effect to be created with this effect data.

CEffectData/SetEntIndex.description: Sets the entity of the effect via its index.

CEffectData/SetEntity.description: Sets the entity of the effect to be created with this effect data.

CEffectData/SetFlags.description: Sets the flags of the effect.

CEffectData/SetHitBox.description: Sets the hit box index of the effect.

CEffectData/SetMagnitude.description: Sets the magnitude of the effect.

CEffectData/SetMaterialIndex.description: Sets the material index of the effect.

CEffectData/SetNormal.description: Sets the normalized direction vector of the effect to be created with this effect data.

CEffectData/SetOrigin.description: Sets the origin of the effect to be created with this effect data.

CEffectData/SetRadius.description: Sets the radius of the effect to be created with this effect data.

CEffectData/SetScale.description: Sets the scale of the effect to be created with this effect data.

CEffectData/SetStart.description: Sets the start of the effect to be created with this effect data.

CEffectData/SetSurfaceProp.description: Sets the surface property index of the effect.
